title: @Riot HUD Team @Rayven   Any plans to mirror the champion information on the Tab screen?
body:
Hey Riot HUD Team,
I'm really enjoying all of the improvements on the new UI. It was a little bumpy getting used to it at first, but it has really grown on me. I've noticed that each patch refines it more and I was wondering if you have any plans on mirroring the champion info on the Tab screen. 
Right now in spectator mode the champion information is mirrored and it makes comparing information between champions really easy at a glance. I was hoping that that would be applied to the Tab screen in game because it would be consistent with other parts of the game (spectator mode) and improve readability at a glance. 
I included images of the currect Tab screen as well as the upcoming spectator mode update just as reference.
Thank you for all of your hard work! 

To the community: What are your thoughts on having the Tab screen mirrored? Feel free to comment and vote in the poll.

replies.body: Hey hippo, sorry for the late response. We are planning to offer that layout as a preference.
Late response is better than no response! Thanks for the update. I got super excited when I saw it on the PBE. Thanks for all you do!
